title: Employee Satisfaction Survey (Version B)
description: Your feedback helps us improve our company culture and processes.

elements.name: nps_score
elements.title: On a scale of 0-10, how likely are you to recommend our company as a great place to work?

elements.name: nps_detractor_feedback
elements.title: We're sorry to hear that. What are the most important reasons for your score?

elements.name: nps_promoter_feedback
elements.title: That's great to hear! What do you value most about working here?

elements.name: company_ratings
elements.title: Please rate the following aspects of the company:

elements.name: poor_rating_followup
elements.title: You rated at least one area as 'Poor'. Could you please provide more specific feedback on what we can improve?
elements.visibleIf: {company_ratings.Communication from leadership.rating} = 'Poor' or {company_ratings.Company benefits (health, etc.).rating} = 'Poor' or {company_ratings.Opportunities for growth.rating} = 'Poor'
